59f3b01e8bf5501e050f35b3.name: Winter's Wrath
59f3b01e8bf5501e050f35b3.description: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.
59f3b01e8bf5501e050f35b3.tooltip:
Sejuani swings her flail, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying Frost to enemies hit and knocking minions and monsters back.

She then lashes out with her flail, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage, applying Frost and slowing enemies hit briefly.

59f3b01e8bf5501e050f35b5.name: Glacial Prison
59f3b01e8bf5501e050f35b5.description: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
59f3b01e8bf5501e050f35b5.tooltip:
Sejuani throws her True Ice bola that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and stuns them for {{ e2 }} second.

The bola becomes more powerful as it travels, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, stunning for {{ e6 }} seconds and creating a storm that slows other enemies by {{ e8 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slows by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3b01d8bf5501e050f35b1.name: Twisted Advance
59f3b01d8bf5501e050f35b1.description: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.
59f3b01d8bf5501e050f35b1.tooltip:
Maokai transforms into a moving mass of roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target.

Upon arrival, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and roots the target for {{ e2 }} second(s).

59f3b01d8bf5501e050f35b0.name: Bramble Smash
59f3b01d8bf5501e050f35b0.description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing physical damage and slowing them.
59f3b01d8bf5501e050f35b0.tooltip: Maokai smashes his fist into the ground, releasing a shockwave. Nearby enemies are knocked away from him and all affected enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed briefly.

59f3b01d8bf5501e050f35b2.name: Sapling Toss
59f3b01d8bf5501e050f35b2.description: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.
59f3b01d8bf5501e050f35b2.tooltip:
Maokai flings a sapling, which stands watch for {{ f1 }} seconds. Saplings will chase nearby enemies, detonating on proximity, dealing {{ e1 }} +{{ e8 }}% [+{{ a1 }}%] Target Max Health magic damage and slowing enemies struck by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Saplings placed in brush last for {{ e9 }} seconds and cause a larger explosion, dealing double damage over {{ e6 }} seconds to all enemies hit.

Maximum {{ e4 }} Damage to non-Champions, doubled for brush.

59f3b01e8bf5501e050f35b4.name: Permafrost
59f3b01e8bf5501e050f35b4.description: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks. Sejuani can damage a frozen enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.
59f3b01e8bf5501e050f35b4.tooltip:
Passive: Nearby melee allied champions' basic attacks apply Frost to enemy champions and large monsters.

Active: Target enemy with 4 stacks of Frost takes {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and is stunned for {{ e1 }} second(s).

16

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bbf.name: Mortal Reminder
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bbf.description:
+50 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive - Executioner: Physical damage inflicts Grievous Wounds on enemy champions for 5 seconds.
UNIQUE Passive - Last Whisper: +35% Bonus Armor Penetration.
